about_the_game:
Door Kickers
Original soundtrack of Door Kickers, Rock Paper Shotgun’s “Bestest Best Tactics of 2014”. Perfect music to your high octane strategic endeavors.

Composed by George Vlad

Tracklist
1. Counter Measures 02:32
2. Run and Gun 01:34
3. Kicking Doors 01:04
4. Distraction Devices 01:01
5. Perimeter Breach 02:45
6. Asymmetric Tactics 03:25
7. On Sight 02:42
8. Methods of Entry 02:54
9. Close Quarters Combat 03:01
10. High Risk 03:13
11. Vital Target 02:54
12. Coordinated Surveillance 1:54
13. Hazardous Devices 2:54
14. Tactical Intervention 1:53
15. Uncertain Outcome 2:54

Includes files in Mp3 and Flac format. Once purchased, files will be available in your SteamApps folder under ...Steam\steamapps\common\DoorKickers\Soundtrack

short_description: Original soundtrack from the hit SWAT command game Door Kickers. In Mp3 and Flac format.
